long_description: Supplying the perfect amount of post-yoga warmth, the Patagonia At Sea wrap sustains your relaxed state of mind with its soft fabric. Organic cotton, polyester and spandex combine to create a fleece that feels so good, you'll find yourself wearing the wrap long after yoga class has ended. The Patagonia At Sea wrap features a button closure and a ribbed binding at neck and placket.
short_description: Supplying the perfect amount of post-yoga warmth, the Patagonia At Sea wrap sustains your relaxed state of mind with its soft fabric.
